class.name: OpenXRSpatialComponentMesh3DList
class.brief_description: Object for storing the queries mesh3d result data.
class.description: Object for storing the queries 3d mesh result data when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.query_snapshot].

method.name: get_mesh
method.description: Returns the mesh for the entity at this [param index].

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Returns the transform for positioning our mesh for the entity at this [param index].
